english.segment1: Every time when I close my eye. I catch a glimpse of the west coast sun-rise. And I can tell you, you're just as beautiful
english.segment2: Overwhelmed by the fear and stage-fright. You're the only one in my spot-light. Even when you don't so beautiful
english.segment3: We've got one chance, We've got one chance. We've got on chance to shine, to shine
english.segment4: Still awake at the start of daylight. I miss you bad, but I swear I'm alright. I'll see you soon, when the leave turn colorful
english.segment5: I see your face in my own reflection. Scan the crowd but there's no connection. With out you, nothing feels like home
english.segment6: We've got one chance, We've got one chance. We've got on chance to shine
english.segment7: We've got one chance to make things right. We've got on chance to shine, to shine, to shine, to shine
english.segment8: We've got one chance to make things right. We've got on chance to shine
english.segment9: We've got one chance, We've got one chance. We've got on chance to shine
